resources.string: Active this to activate Lock Screen Widget. Lock the device from software

"Go to Settings > Secure > Administrator and active Admin Lock Screen to do work this widget. If you want to uninstall the app you have to disabled administrator permissions. This administration permission will only be used to lock the device from software."
You need to activate Admin Settings before you use the widget
Lock Screen Widget Admin: Enabled correctly!
Lock Screen Widget Admin: Disabled correctly!
You need to have this marked to Look screen widget can work.
